welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lynn Haven, USA! This quaint city is known for its charming streets, friendly locals, and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Lynn Haven has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport serves as the primary hub for major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport handles regional and low-cost carrier flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
